NeedDef.label: Automaton Fuel
NeedDef.description: The amount of fuel used by the automaton. When the gauge reaches zero, The automaton will enter emergency power mode and become very slow.

NeedDef.label: Maintenance
NeedDef.description:
The maintenance status of the automaton.

If it is low, it will cause malfunction.

Maintenance is required every year (60 rimworld days).
